text: Mucilaginibacter auburnensis is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped and non-spore- forming bacterium from the genus of Mucilaginibacter which has been isolated from the stem from a corn plant Zea mays from the field of E. V. Smith Research Center, Plant Breeding Unit facility in Tallassee in the United States. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Mucilaginibacter auburnensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingobacteriia Category:Bacteria described in 2014
title: Mucilaginibacter auburnensis
